allIssues.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
allIssues.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements
allIssues.summary: Fix all of the following:\n  List element has direct children that are not allowed: div
allIssues.source:
<ul class="c-menu_list is-list0 a-carousel" data-component="carousel" data-settings="{
                                            'perPage': { 300: 3.2, 460: 4.2, 768: 5.2, 1024: 8 },
                                            'showPagination': false,
                                            'autoplay': false,
                                            'loop': false,
                                            'loopForcesUpdateSliders': true
                                        }">

allIssues.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
